code: @Override public void performAction(IndexMetaData indexMetaData, ClusterState currentClusterState, ClusterStateObserver observer, Listener listener) {     OpenIndexRequest request = new OpenIndexRequest(indexMetaData.getIndex().getName()).     getClient().admin().indices().open(request, ActionListener.wrap(r -> {         assert r.isAcknowledged() : "open index response is not acknowledged".         listener.onResponse(true).     }, listener::onFailure)). }
